---
title: "R Notebook"
output: html_notebook
---
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
er_wait_times <- read_csv("waittimes_record.csv")
```


```{r}
er_wait_times %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = read_timestamp, y = total_minutes)) + 
  geom_point() +
  geom_line(aes(color = site_labels)) + 
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(legend.position = "none")
```
